Posted By: deadeye1387 (9/26/2011 6:11:53 PM)

posts.post_content:
@2pcsofcandy: perhaps her marks are not glowing because she's finally found a way to get around her dark deal with the demons, or at least one of them? After all, that IS why she's in Innistrad, to hunt down, or find a weapon to kill one of the three demons ruling her. If I'm not mistaken, Griselbrand, the demon who killed Avacyn, is one of the demons Liliana had a pact with. Can anyone confirm this?  
  
Or alternatively, her deal with Nicol Bolas is overriding the demon magic... After all, Bolas is more powerful than the three demons combined. (see novel Test of Metal for more on Liliana's deal with Bolas)

Posted By: RazielKane (10/9/2011 12:26:30 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Ok, I have skipped the prerelease for schooling, and went to the bloody release, first pack i opened was her. <3<3<3.  
  
That being said, she is an amazing card if you can play constructed. Otherwise, her abilities in limited is hard to pull off. I lost all my matches and the worse part about it was she was always out on the field. Her abilities to my perspective are really tuned but can be improved. I wished they had the other artwork steve argyle did. the slightly uncensored version. This one, its ok, but the uncensored was just beautiful. the background fit her perfectly, and the outfit was teasing, but not \*\*\*ty. It was perfect at casting the essence of lili. Beautiful, seductive, but will run you through like any sorceress would. Her current ratings are accurate with what she do so im glad :)
posts.html:
